system.description:
A tome of arcane knowledge affiliated with a specific alignment. The effects of opening the tome depend on the class and alignment of the character.

  • Libram’s alignment: Determined by rolling [[/br 1d6]]:

    • 1–2: Lawful

    • 3–4: Neutral

    • 5–6: Chaotic.

  • Vanishes after use: Once the book’s magical effect has occurred, it vanishes.

  • Arcane casters (same alignment): May study the tome for 1 week to gain one experience level. A character can only gain this benefit once, even if another golden libram is discovered.

  • Arcane casters (other alignment): Suffer [[/r 5d4]] damage, fall unconscious for [[/r 5d4]] turns, and become unable to gain experience points unless a quest of atonement is performed.

  • Other classes: Must save versus spells or become permanently insane. This insanity can only be removed by magic.
